A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Where the hell do I even start...

Let's go with blunt: Rian Johnson and Disney ruined Luke Skywalker\, my favorite cinematic character and childhood hero. Come to think of it\, I don't recall ever being this upset. 

The movie we watched was some crude amalgamation of Harry Potter\, The Avengers and GotG with an underwhelming pinch of classic Star Wars. The incessant joking took away from anything serious this movie might have offered. 

PS\, Rian Johnson just took my #1 Unqualified A$$wipe spot from Donald Trump.
